experience.name: Full-Stack Mobile Developer @ Influur
experience.description: Building influencer marketing strategies through cutting-edge technology.

experience.name: Web Dev Contractor
experience.description: Private web development contractor for local businesses.

experience.name: Founding Product Engineer @ CorkVision
experience.description: AI Data Analytics for the Wine Industry
highlights: Joined as the second employee and Founding Product Engineer at a pre-revenue startup backed by AWS and NVIDIA Inception Program.

Functioned as the sole frontend developer and Technical Lead, architecting and developing over 60% of the production codebase for cross-platform web and mobile applications (Flutter, Node.js, AWS services).
Designed the monolithic service architecture and managed the CI/CD pipeline, ensuring a fast, stable, and unified codebase for both web and mobile deployment.
Delivered a strategic impact by developing a custom Business Intelligence (BI) solution that eliminated $10K-$15K in monthly recurring costs (by replacing AWS QuickSight).
Spearheaded client relations, meeting weekly with beta wineries to gather product requirements, iterate rapidly on MVP features, and directly influence the development roadmap.

experience.name: Founder / Instructor @ PerfectLine
highlights: Delivered a production web application serving a range of active students with personalized C++ curriculum and progress tracking.
Managed 10-15 clients simultaneously, handling all operations including curriculum planning, billing, and scheduling.
Developed comprehensive C++ curriculum covering data structures, OOP, and algorithm design.

experience.name: BentoLabs
experience.description: A proprietary, fully-featured, production-ready codebase and architecture designed to accelerate new product development across any modern stack.
highlights: Architected and developed a codebase automation tool to save on 3-6 months of development time.
Constructed seamless frontend component libraries and the application layer across two core frameworks: Flutter for cross-platform mobile and Next.js/React for web deployment.
Developed two distinct, high-performance backend options using Deno/Hono and Node/Express runtimes, providing clients with ultimate flexibility based on performance requirements.

experience.name: SurfBored
experience.description: The only social app designed to get you off your phone and into real experiences with the people you care about.
highlights: Built a cross-platform mobile application using Flutter, integrating Firebase Authentication and PostgreSQL database with Docker containerization.
Led a small team of developers through the complete product lifecycle, coordinating sprint planning, code reviews, and deployment strategies to deliver features on schedule.
Designed and implemented normalized database schemas and state management architecture using BLoC architecture, optimizing app performance and data consistency across user sessions.

experience.name: Cosmiq
experience.description: Smart markdown-based note-taking desktop app with AI-powered study tools built in 36 hours at CruzHacks 2025
highlights: Built a WYSIWYG markdown editor desktop application using React and Tauri, implementing file system interaction to manage local notes and documents.

Architected and deployed Node.js/Express backend on Google Cloud Run to handle API requests, integrating Google Gemini APIs for AI-powered summarization and dynamic quiz generation with detailed explanations.
Developed frontend with React hooks, routing, and state management while coordinating between Rust-based Tauri desktop layer and cloud-hosted backend services.
